name: Pyrotechnic Punks
description:
Created for Mini Jam 124: Warmth in January 2023

Johnny has decided this city is just too cold. Johnny is recruiting members to his ill-fated gang in an effort to burn the city down to warm it up.

Burn cars, trash cans, and cops to increase your score and make that cash. Initiate new gang members and increase their hit points to complete the game.

Controls:

WASD or Arrows to Move.

Space or Left click to attack.

Designed by SAWD Games in collaboration with luisdenpixel

Programmed by Justin Chartier and John Day

Art direction and graphics by luisdenpixel
